item.title: About
item.description: I’m George William Matthews – welcome to my blog! Here you’ll find mostly materials I use in philosophy courses I teach, but then maybe I’ll start actually writing some blog posts that I have been wanting to write. This blog is built with the static website generator hugo which, if you are not familiar with static site generators, is a program that takes a collection of text files and automagically turns them into webpages so you don’t have to slog through all of the html code yourself.

item.title: Online Texts
item.description: Here are a couple of projects I have been working on in the last few years.

item.title: Science Slideshows
item.description: This is all pretty self-explanatory – these are some slideshows, produced once again with xaringan and R-Studio and open for reuse and remixing.

item.title: Ethics Slideshows
item.description: These are the latest iteration of online teaching materials for a distance learning ethics course I have been teaching for the last (gasp!!) 20 years.

item.title: Intro Slideshows
item.description: These slideshows were created for use in on online Introduction to Philosophy course.

item.title: B
item.description: This is the B file in a new directory.
